documents.document: @GumtreeAu @taboola And then I get retweeted immediately by a bot... I'm going to start drinking beer now...
@crystale @sacca pretty sure he now knows the American word for GTFO. Sad.
I hate the internet sometimes, just looked at a listing on @gumtreeau and then it pops up on another site via @taboola within 20 seconds.
@riskybusiness if this is going to be your coping mechanism, you're gonna get real fit.
@lazygamereviews shit dood! How about a celebratory LGR 500K Sandwich!
Great to be doing some collab with fellow #govCMS peeps at #govCMSCamp.

@riskybusiness Like the start of Tomorrow, When the War Began. You have better slappers though.
@cvharrop any insight into the average page load time? 3.12s seems too high. We're seeing less 500ms. Is there a site skewing that data?

@riskybusiness what a crazy year :) Next year should be just as cyber. Massive thanks for the content, and the guests, enjoyed every ep.
@jonfavs @sacca My 5 month old slept through the night last night, and we got an unbroken nights sleep for the first time in ages.

@troyhunt we're considering offshoring some development work at the moment, thanks for sharing.
@riskybusiness Gotcha, thought you were referring to something tangible being gone re Trump. Looking forward to the show.
@riskybusiness interested to hear some of what you saw missing/gone if you care to share it.
@thomasfuchs will take a read.
@thomasfuchs @ianlandsman Yeah ok, you're referring to the electoral college I guess?
@thomasfuchs @ianlandsman And yet Trump. If he'd had lost today, possibility of his "movement" == new party? He's hardly a party candidate.
@thomasfuchs @ianlandsman in Oz, major parties losing voters to smaller issue based parties. They hold balance of power in our lower house.
@thomasfuchs @ianlandsman no doubt that's part of the problem, hence the suggestion.
@thomasfuchs @ianlandsman and consider starting new parties, with new ideas/solutions if you think that established parties don't cut it.
@mpesce funnily, poll today on @abcnews suggested that Obama would have beaten trump, for what those polls are worth at this point.
@mpesce @sacca talks about the loss of the US Dream when campaigning for Obama in '12 (@TWistartups ep 295) Trump is the change agent today.
@mpesce GCF, loss of jobs to automation/offshore, loss of small business to big box retail, wealth inequality, heath care/education funding.
@mpesce when you have no job/house/community/future/hope and see the status-quo in Hill-bama, kinda makes sense.
@mpesce I love his work.
@naval As an outsider, the previously absurd notion that some citizens owned guns to protect themselves from govt seems (oddly) justified.
@naval While cliched, reminds me of V for Vendetta, where the police submit to their identify as citizens and abandon the regime (elites).
@naval "Disturbingly, the gun owners, the police, and the military are in the wrong demographic." That's chilling.
@riskybusiness so... looking forward to the news in the next few weeks.
So this going to be a depression era reconstruction program? How you gonna pay for that? No wait... can we sell you iron ore?!
The centre has to start dealing with the fact that globalisation isn't working for everyone, the "fringe" will clean up until that happens.
